history.proof: apply Build_IncreasingSeparationAlgebra. intros x. unfold increasing. intros n n' H. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: apply Build_IncreasingSeparationAlgebra. intros x. unfold increasing. intros n n' H. destruct H as [m [H1 H2]]. transitivity m. apply H2. apply H1.
